Title: Establishes Dakota's law relating to elevated lead levels in children
Summary: Relates to elevated lead levels in children, and requires insurance companies to cover testing for elevated lead levels.
LawCode: Amd §§1370-a & 1373, add §1370-f, Pub Health L; amd §§3216, 3221 & 4303, Ins L; amd §365-a, Soc Serv L; amd §14, Pub Hous L; amd §383, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the insurance law, the social services law, the public housing law and the executive law, in relation to elevated lead levels in children
